title: Rosie Huntington-Whiteley is all business in tailored jacket and slacks for meeting in Beverly Hills
text:
She's a model and a working mom.

And on Tuesday, Rosie Huntington-Whiteley was all business as she headed to a meeting in Beverly Hills.

The 32-year-old stepped out in a mauve tailored jacket and matching slacks.

Model style: Rosie Huntington-Whiteley was all business as she headed to a meeting in Beverly Hills wearing a mauve tailored jacket and matching slacks and chatting on her phone

She added a white top and a long brown leather belt with statement gold buckle.

Rosie wore her long blonde hair tied back from her face in a ponytail and carried a large white purse.

She chatted away on her phone as she handed her black SUV over to a valet at her destination.

Working: Rosie, 32, added a white top and long brown leather belt with statement buckle. She wore her long blonde hair tied back from her face in a ponytail and carried a large white purse

In 2010, the British model started dating fellow Brit and Hollywood action star Jason Statham.

The couple, who are based in Los Angeles, got engaged in January 2016 and welcomed their son Jack in 2017.

Statham was most recently seen on the big screen with Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson in the Fast And Furious spin-off Hobbs & Shaw.

On Monday, it was reported that he is set to reunite with British director Guy Ritchie who gave him his first movie break in the 1998 film Lock, Stock And Two Smoking Barrels.

According to Deadline.com, the project will be a revenge-based action thriller based on the 2004 French film Le Convoyeur.
description: Rosie wore her long blonde hair tied back from her face in a ponytail, carried a large white purse and chatted away on her phone as she handed her black SUV over to a valet at her destination.
